title: One Way Street
description: In his debut novel, REICHOLD STREET, award-winning author R.L. Herron created a powerful coming-of-age story set in the tumultuous Vietnam era, dealing with the tough issues of family dysfunction, alcoholism, bullying, suicide, madness and war. Endorsed by "Compulsion Reads," it became a 2012 Readers Favorite Gold Medal Winner that Kirkus Reviews called "Skillfully written and emotionally strong." In his new 5-Star-rated novel, ONE WAY STREET, Herron has created an equally powerful sequel in which several key "Reichold Street" characters return in a tense, gritty, historically accurate thriller. Set during and immediately after the turbulent 1960s, the electrifying story follows those characters again through war, despondency, love and a murderous stalker. Contains some (minimal) adult language.
author: R.L. Herron
